title: The Locked Heart
description: Darby just wants a drink when the airline cancels her flight, but she gets she gets noticed by Damien, a handsome man who wants to spend the night with her. Darby loves being dominated, so she travels to The Aerie, the private BDSM sex club Damien frequents, to see if she really is a submissive.At The Aerie, Damien's normal detachment fails him with Darby. He's obsessed with her enthusiasm and grace but he's locked his heart against her love. This book contains scorching hot scenes of BDSM sex between a blackhearted Dom and a natural sub, but don't be it's really a romance. Approximately 30,000 words.
author: Christina Thacher
